title: Poolside Grilling Area, Tranquil Views, Lighted Tennis Courts
posting_body: ['Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'Located in North Atlanta, Veridian at Sandy Springs will elevate your life to new levels of luxury.', 'Choose from a variety of one bedroom or two bedroom Atlanta apartments that are carefully arranged in a fantastic pet-friendly community and feature first-class amenities.', 'You will look forward to coming home and enjoying a North Atlanta, GA apartment with your very own fireplace, and appreciate the convenience of our state-of-the-art fitness center to use at your leisure.', 'Our community boasts excellent features including lighted tennis courts and a gorgeously crafted swimming pool, all within close proximity to public transportation.', 'With easy access to the GA-9, and a location right next door to the Northridge Shopping Center, residents of our pet-friendly Sandy Springs apartments are never far from the best shopping, dining and entertainment in North Atlanta, GA.', 'Schedule a tour of our luxury community today—don’t miss out on all that our apartments in Sandy Springs, GA have to offer you.', 'Amenities:', '-Dining Rooms with Breakfast Bars', '-2 inch Faux Wood Blinds', '-Built-in Microwave', '-Hard Surface Flooring', '-Private Balconies', '-Lighted Tennis Courts', '-On-site Clothes Care Facility', '-Great', 'Sandy Springs Location Convenient to GA 400, I-285, Alpharetta, Norcross, Roswell, Dunwoody and Buckhead', '-Newly Renovated Interiors', '-Resident Lounge and Cyber Cafe', '-24 Hour Strength and Cardio Center', '-Controlled Access Entry', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
